website_summaries.verdict: The FI9826P's unnecessarily tedious setup process, old-school Web interface and lack of push notifications seriously stunt this otherwise impressive Wi-Fi camera.
pros: The $220, £135, AU$230 Foscam FI9826P has excellent specs, including 300-degree pan, 120-degree tilt and 3x optical zoom
It offers local SD card and cloud storage services
cons: It will likely take at least one call to customer service to figure out the FI9826P's setup and even longer to make sense of its outdated Web interface
The Foscam Viewer Android and iOS app can't send push notifications

customer_reviews.title: Camera works great and easy access with Blue Iris software
customer_reviews.text: Just received the camera this week and set it up yesterday. I am using Blue Iris software to access my security cameras and used the IP Camera search tool on the provided CD to identify the IP address and port. Everything is working as expected for a camera in this price range...good but not perfect. Had one minor issue as I could not get the secure https port to detect in Blue Iris...however...did not spend much time troubleshooting as all my other cameras in Blue Iris use http ports.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Matthews

customer_reviews.title: The camera itself is pretty good, but it doesn't currently work with Firefox
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself is pretty good, but it doesn't currently work with Firefox, and it's v-e-r-y sensitive to distance from the Ethernet switch, with momentary drops off of the network every few minutes (not good if you want to use these for security). I hope that will be fixed in a future firmware upgrade, but the company was not able to provide me any details. If not for that I would give them 5 stars, as the quality is good and I really like the zoom, and the field of view is much better than my older 10W and 18W Foscams.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is used in our house as a Cat Cam so we can watch what they are up to when we're not home. This was very easy to set up and is easy to use. When our cats hear it moving, at least one comes over and sniffs it, so we get a view of a giant cat nose. We plan to add additional cams around the house to have more thorough coverage of our feline's activities.
customer_reviews.author: kittybits

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3.5 years
customer_reviews.text: Pro: - Good video quality - compatible with IP camera security software ( e.g. Synology) Con: - large camera and too noticeable - needed manual reboot about every six months after disconnect from network both LAN and WLAN - failed after 3.5 years. Camera just clicking and unable to reset.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: The only negative this i would say is I would like them to improve the speaker/microphone on the camera
customer_reviews.text: We use this camera for two things. A baby monitor using an iOS app and a security camera using a QNAP surveillance software. This model suits our needs and has functioned well since we purchased it. The only negative this i would say is I would like them to improve the speaker/microphone on the camera. We have our home wired for cat6 and there is still a delay in the audio. Also, the mic on the camera needs to be fairly close to whoever is talking for the camera to pick it up clearly. Other than that, works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: csward

customer_reviews.title: Found problems fixed - used Blue Iris software to fix
customer_reviews.text: When put into service, two months after purchase the camera, lost function of the aperture. Foscam said: go to seller. Seller--6ave says to go to Amazon. Amazon says it can't be returned or refunded after 30 days. So that makes for a big zero for service. Camera seemed to work great, then died after 24 hours on line. There is a sub-menu in Blue Iris that says mode, but it is 50hz, 60hz, or outdoor. Outdoor fixed problem.
customer_reviews.author: William Richards

customer_reviews.title: Like all Foscam cameras this model is rock solid
customer_reviews.text: Like all Foscam cameras this model is rock solid! Set it up once and you can rely on it!. Great camera for the DIY as set up is a breeze. Using the free Foscam app makes is simple. I highly recommend these products. Again, my Foscam Rep "Love" was wonderful! She is very committed to solving any issue you have. Pleasant to speak with and very knowledgeable.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia M. Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Had issues using it with my iPhone.
customer_reviews.text: Had issues using it with my iPhone. Purchased an amcrest camera instead which works seamlessly and is a bit cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Lana S.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera...no help from customer service
customer_reviews.text: The camera arrived and was easy to install. The mounting bracket that comes in the box is adequate, however, I chose to go with the recommended metal bracket. I'm very happy with the performance of the camera. I use it to view my saltwater aquarium remotely.The only reason I gave the camera 4 stars was because of the company's customer service. Prior to the purchase, I called and Bruce answered the call. He was absolutely no help. In spite of my pour experience with customer service, I purchased the camera and was glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: This cam is a good improvement over the others
customer_reviews.text: This cam is a good improvement over the others. 3x optical zoom isnt' much but it does give greater clarity when looking at things farther away. The only complaint I have is that the zoom is very noisy. So if I use it everyone in the room looks up at the source of the sound (even 15 feet away they hear it). It's kinda a clunky gear noise....perhaps I got a defective unit but I don't think so as it works fine aside from the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Foscam did not keep warranty promise
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 3 months. Foscam Direct promised to replace. Now I don't have a camera, and am out my $190.00. Foscam Direct never sent a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: No Response
customer_reviews.text: I've learned that companies rarely respond to bad news. That is until you mention it on Amazon. I've invested well over $1000 in Foscam cameras and related equipment. They update their mobile app and suddenly all I get is a picture of a sprouting plant and the proverb, "Everything new is fine." Here's one of mine, "Fix your crap or my money goes elsewhere."
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Back in the Box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because it seemed to have better features than the Nestcam and many good reviews. While I am not tech challenged, fussing with software for security cameras was not something I wanted to spend time doing--and I definitely don't want to spend time on the phone with tech assistance. After about 45 minutes of trying to get it connected I boxed it back up for return. My Nestcam connected to wifi and was up and running in literally 2 minutes. Ease of use is certainly worth the increased cost to me.
customer_reviews.author: HTB

customer_reviews.title: It works great - I'm spoiled now
customer_reviews.text: I've placed this in my daughter's room (2 year old) and have old iPhones as "monitors". It works great - I'm spoiled now. One thing to note if using exclusively as a baby monitor like we do - we still use an audio monitor in addition, due to how quickly the video stream can drain the iPhone (and I don't want the video playing all night long if I'm trying to sleep).
customer_reviews.author: B. Rimnac

customer_reviews.title: Its not as easy as the instructions say
customer_reviews.text: To date, I have ordered 5 of this product. My one complaint is that I've had to have a technician set up the installation/program the cameras. Its not as easy as the instructions say, so there was an additional cost to me. Other than that, I'd recommend them because of the clarity of picture, the accuracy in what it captures, and the fact that they can be moved around without any permanent damage to my home.
customer_reviews.author: George Sennatt

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality cam, a little work to set up.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works good but took a lot of online research to configure. Luckily I'm good with gadgets so I got it working. Would not advise you get this if you know nothing about home networking or at least have a friend who does.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great baby cam
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a webcam for our baby but the stock app sucks. We use a 3rd party app from the app store. Great clarity, opens FAST.
customer_reviews.author: MCP

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera works great. Very good resolution and I like the optical zoom. Setup is easy as is using the browser interface. The audio and motion detection are tailorable and work well. It has been running continuously since installation and has not skipped a beat.
customer_reviews.author: alpo

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera was delivered in good condition Setup was fairly easy although a little more difficult for WiFi setup. Works well with good picture. New cell phone and web software were recently released which work very well. My only gripe is that it does not work with Foscam cloud data storage. The version 2 does though.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Got a lot of time on your hands - you'll need it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice picture. I guess I'll get it working right eventually. I am able to see an IR view on my smartphone when the camera is hard-wired into my router. Doesn't work reliably in wireless mode. Buy this only if you have A LOT of time to play with this. The model isn't even a listed choice yet in the Foscam viewing software. But the picture is good.
customer_reviews.author: EqualTempTuner

customer_reviews.title: I consider myself pretty tech savvy but found this difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: I consider myself pretty tech savvy but found this difficult to install. I was forced to have Foscam remote access my computer, which I never like doing but they were very helpful and got it the up and running. I purchased this camera mainly to check in on my 2 dogs when I'm away. Overall, I like it and find it pretty easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: I regret buying this camera. Should have gone with Dropcam instead.
customer_reviews.text: I deeply regret buying these cameras. If you use a Mac, the configuration is almost impossible and the software is horribly complex. The iOS apps are also horribly designed and useless. I just spent hours trying to configure and reconfigure the app to connect to the cameras. I'm able to connect on the internal wireless network, but absolutely cannot connect to the cameras using either UPnP or port forwarding. Kind of useless that I can't check on the cameras in my home when I'm away. What a waste of money. Now I know why people go with Dropcam instead.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Cornett

customer_reviews.title: Video quality is fine. The software does not allow the user to ...
customer_reviews.text: Video quality is fine. The software does not allow the user to name an FTP upload file (it changes the name with each upload) like the non HD cameras. Thus impossible to use on a web site without writing a Pearl Script. They say they have new firmware coming but unknown if the will incorporate the necessary feature for FTP upload. Tech support is one of the most uninformed group of people I have gad the mispleasure to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: J W Morton

customer_reviews.title: Connection was easy if you know anything about ip cameras
customer_reviews.text: Had to return item. Focus was off. Blurry image and couldn't see images. Connection was easy if you know anything about ip cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Rose

customer_reviews.title: Foscam review
customer_reviews.text: I like the features and functionality of the device. I used tinycam monitor pro as the software...I love the interface of the app. Only problem i had a bit difficulty was connecting the camera to the router ..I did the port forwarding...but go figure my public up changes every so often...now going to try using a static ip address....
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Bivens

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: the internet softwere works so much bettter then the one you download...even with them walking me though set up, i had problems...so now i just log on and can see it anywhere. in a 3 level house with grand kids coming several times a week i need ed extra eyes in the back of my head and these cams do it
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hamski

customer_reviews.title: Upset... Plug & Pay
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding camera !!... Exactly what I'd hoped for. 1st IP camera in many moons that performs as advertised Cudos!! To Foscam Group. Pan / tilt/ zoom its quick to respond . I'll never buy another brand. Update ...it quit working in two days, come to find out you need to pay for cloud support (mandatory) for it to operate. They don't tell you that up front so I had to hire a technician to figure that out...he contacted Foscam and the camera that advertised "plug & play" was in fact PLUG & PAY.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Great indoor cam with HD quality picture. I bought this cam intended to be a baby monitor. All the other baby monitor had low quality picture. I love this cam because it has Wifi capability. You need to configure the router to do port fowarding in order to be able to view your camera over the internet.
customer_reviews.author: r4v3m4n

customer_reviews.title: Unholy pain in the ass
customer_reviews.text: This GOD DAMNED camera is such an unholy pain in the ass to setup. And once the camera decides to randomly accept the settings it decides to disconnect at random intervals. If you buy this camera get ready for a lot of Login Fail: Connect Fail. FOSCAM support: This takes way too long to setup and the link you sent for your videos takes even more time. This camera is anything but user friendly. And to make matters worse there's a lame 30 day return policy so now I'm stuck selling this god forsaken thing on Craigslist.
customer_reviews.author: MikeC

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Very slow to respond, way to bright, software doesn't work half of the time, very limited view. Wifi connection dies. I had high hopes but I was let down.
customer_reviews.author: ShyAmazonFantasy

customer_reviews.title: But this thing was so super difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: Ricardo John helped me a lot. But this thing was so super difficult to install. It simply COULD NOT be done without getting them to manually take over the computer and do it themselves. Hang it up if you think this will be a simple, painless task to connect. Go ahead and chalk a few hours up to set up times. Camera is good and the picture is great....
customer_reviews.author: ShopperTruth

customer_reviews.title: Foscam...great camera
customer_reviews.text: Always pleased with Foscam. I have approximately 9 of their cameras (this is the 3rd of this model) so far. Have only had to replace one pwr supply on one of the oldest...pretty good for 4 yrs of 24/7 uptime.
customer_reviews.author: jrusns

customer_reviews.title: Worked great till I went to set the second camera
customer_reviews.text: Worked great till I went to set the second camera . Says password or username is wrong. So it won't allow me to use it or change the pass word using them on my I phone. Also need info on a DVR or some kid of storage . I can't get the DVD to play on my lap top for so that makes it tough to use . There phone help is to busy for my time burned so I guess you should hire a professional installer!
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to get installed correctly
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but could use an Instructions For Dummies manual. I have a Master Degree in Computer Science and I still do not understand all the instructions for this. It took me 4 hours to get it installed in a wired format. I never could get the wireless to work.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Mohrmann

customer_reviews.title: A great update over the FI9826W
customer_reviews.text: A great update over the FI9826W, that has too many focus problems, this one has a very clear picture no matter the zoom or the distance. Set up is very easy. I've purchased a few of them and no problems at all so far.
customer_reviews.author: Edil Bertini Baro

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The setup requires a little patience. I had to restart the computer for the settings to "take", but that's par for the course for many hardware devices.
customer_reviews.author: HD Video guy

customer_reviews.title: It's is still the best on the market in its price range
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because it is overpriced. It's Double the price of the standard FI9821 and the only extra noticeable feature is the zoom. But the zoom is awesomely crispy. If you got it. Get it . it's well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Lou Wingfield

customer_reviews.title: Mixed reviews. ..
customer_reviews.text: Works well easy quick app install and remote view. Haven't done the port forwarding yet. Although major issue with speaker and mic very close on camera you get a lot of echo and feedback
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Best Plug & Play Video Camera
customer_reviews.text: Like any good product, this Plug and Play Foscam lives up to its name! Granted, with any piece of equipment has its learning curve and use, but you will not be disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera worth the little extra price!
customer_reviews.text: Top notch camera with amazing night vision and very high quality zoom! Easy to setup, I would highly recommend trying to hard wire the camera, it is just a lot more reliable and better quality audio.
customer_reviews.author: B. Spader

customer_reviews.title: Great support from Foscam
customer_reviews.text: Great support from Foscam, the support team is very knowledgable and quick. Romer was excellent in helping load new firmware, he did an excellent job. Thank you Romer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: JUNK! I have several different Foscam cameras that work great but this one times out, locks up and functions like junk. I'm going to assume it's simply a hardware problem and am returning it for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: T-Bone

customer_reviews.title: NOT WIDE ANGLE
customer_reviews.text: I have many of their older models, these new models do not have wide angle view; don't expect to see more than a 15' width at 40'. Kind of disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: PJDSR

customer_reviews.title: nice mechanical features (PTZ) and built-in speaker
customer_reviews.text: nice mechanical features (PTZ) and built-in speaker... but the video quality is far inferior to the Sharx cameras I own.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many, many cameras and I love the quality of the picture on this camera. One thing I am still unhappy about is the fact I must download a file from the internet to make it work. This software should be built into the camera. Other than that it is a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Moats

customer_reviews.title: Better 'n Better
customer_reviews.text: Every model keeps getting better and more mobile friendly. Good Vendor, Good Product, Rapid delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: No Chrome browser support
customer_reviews.text: No longer supports Chrome browser Do not buy if you use Chrome.
customer_reviews.author: Al Swain

customer_reviews.title: It is just ok.
customer_reviews.text: For the money and hype, I was expecting more quality. Foscam always has some strange weirdness to their products, but it works fine and quality is acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: gadgetguy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent netcam. Really shines when married to the Livecams ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent netcam. Really shines when married to the Livecams Pro app. Setup could be more intuitive, but if you know what you're doing it's not an issue. I bought 12 of them!
customer_reviews.author: Starship-Pilot

customer_reviews.title: So the outfit Foscam says they didn't manufacture this $165 piece of crap so if I would kindly provide them $39
customer_reviews.text: This product is BS. I couldn't get it to work on the WIFI, so I called their customer service line where they are suppose to support the product technically. The first guy asked is what I bought it from. Amazon apparent gets the product from a manufacturer called Citi-Mail. Its apparently chinese manufacturer. So the outfit Foscam says they didn't manufacture this $165 piece of crap so if I would kindly provide them $39.95 they would get camera operating. As this point I rather throw out this piece in the trash than good money after bad. BTW, the instruction were also horrible and one has wonder why Amazon with something like this with no customer support.... DON't BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: F C Toombs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been using the camera for quite sometime and its great. Grey from tech was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Pan and tilt make this camera malfunction
customer_reviews.text: I've bought and installed 3 of these cameras in the non plug and play version, and they work fine, but this newest plug and play camera doesn't work. Whenever I try to pan or tilt the camera, it loses Internet connection and continues to pan or tilt to the most extreme position before it re-establishes the Internet connection. I exchanged the camera with a replacement, but both cameras malfunction in the same way. Called Foscam support and the message said, "You are caller number 31 and your wait time is 35 minutes." No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: A. Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This item only works on your cell phone if you are connected to the Internet via WIFI. I cannot for the life of me get the viewing application to work on my PC either. I would not recommend to a friend for security cameras of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: You will be happy with this camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding camera that delivers a fantastic image and is easily installed!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Joe

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not work, did not get it returned in the time frame allowed.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Boatner

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if using Mac
customer_reviews.text: The interface requires a plugin - should not be the case in the modern age. Quality picture for the price. Response is a bit slow. Update: I own three of these. Maybe they work if you have windows. On Mac they are impossible to use and configure. I got it working once but it requires plugins that are not maintained. When chrome updated I lost all use and I can't even see pictures now. I've never been able to use motion detection or recording because I can't configure the SD card. The support and forums are a rats nest of bad advice and failed solutions. Go elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: The hardware is fine, but the software is from the 90s
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: I tried setting this up the other day to monitor my dog and even though I work in the tech field, I feel like I'm going to need to commit a few hours to resetting this, fussing with the software, getting it on the network. Would not recommend to anyone, it's basically garbage now. The hardware is fine, but the software is from the 90s. Be prepared to use internet explorer for any administration (say hello to some activex controls). The product is enough of a hassle to administer that it's sitting unused in a box in my closet now...
customer_reviews.author: L. Fox

customer_reviews.title: very bad focus the camera arrive with problem in focus the ...
customer_reviews.text: very bad focus the camera arrive with problem in focus the viewing was very bad and far from what i was expected video appear blurred
customer_reviews.author: medhat mansour

customer_reviews.title: boo
customer_reviews.text: This works from my phone over 4G sometimes, other devices not at all. Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: D.suggs

customer_reviews.title: Was very disappointed in the setup process
customer_reviews.text: Camera was not 100% functional, Was very disappointed in the setup process. Cheaply made poor quality. Returned it the next day.
customer_reviews.author: R0B3RT6975

customer_reviews.title: fo-SCAM, with emphasis on the last syllable.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very happy with the unit. Currently, it's a better paperweight than camera. I have spent a few hours trying to get it operational. I bought this product because it was supposed to be "plug and play." Yeah, right. I ventured to their website and it wasn't exactly user friendly and could use a little TLC (Read: the video and other material on the website did not explain why the camera doesn't function). I'll give it another go in the near future - - even update this post if I did something wrong. For now, I do not recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lyn was extremely helpful in getting our camera set up. She patiently and knowledgeably walked us through each step!
customer_reviews.author: James B Shiffler

customer_reviews.title: The high resolution and the software features are excellent. Not inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Performs as advertised. The high resolution and the software features are excellent. Not inexpensive, but a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Whack!

customer_reviews.title: Won’t operate within a Foscam Dome . . .
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the FI9826P as a replacement for a failing FI9821W v2 with psychedelic colors, but received the FI9826P v2. The camera received is light years ahead of its replacement; however, it will not operate in the Foscam Dome of its replacement. The problem is the lens over the IR LEDs. I was able to cover the LEDs on the FI9821W v2 with flat black paint to avoid reflections within the dome. I don’t want to damage the new cam, but am looking for a solution. All suggestions are welcome . . .
customer_reviews.author: Nat Ray

customer_reviews.title: Beware !
customer_reviews.text: Worst experience "EVER" ! Plug and go ! Product works great immediately while at location. The fun begins when trying to access from a different network. I'm on day 3, on phone with probably my 6 - 7th technicians; not even close to getting camera operable. Last tech. just emailed more instructions to try tomorrow. Most likely when / if we get the HD camera running the local WiFi will not support the HD, therefore viewing will be SD. and the extra cost of this camera will be wasted !
customer_reviews.author: Ray P.

customer_reviews.title: Pile-O-Junk
customer_reviews.text: This is a pile of crap - do not buy it. After spending hours to just get it to register on the network, I found the software to be unusable. Simple things like "pan right" would put the camera into a non-stop panning mode, while "pan left" worked just fine. Also, i played the game of "which browser will their software work under" (both Chrome and IE had issues and wouldn't install their mandated plug-ins. Of course, this means you have to download their fat client, but it doesn't seem to work any better. Very disappointed. This will be the only item I will have returned to Amazon in years.
customer_reviews.author: Forwhatitsworth

customer_reviews.title: Great Tech Support
customer_reviews.text: Jonathan Reed Foscam tech Support was very helpful and walked me through the setup quickly. The camera seems great so far. Call tech support if you get confused. Five stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Travisono

customer_reviews.title: Camera picture is great! Had trouble setting getting the camera on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Camera picture is great! Had trouble setting getting the camera on my network, I called Foscam and Richard did everything for me. It was a breeze! If you need help, ask for Richard!
customer_reviews.author: Eldeeder

customer_reviews.title: Image Has Red Tint
customer_reviews.text: This camera seems to yield a daytime (non-infrared) image with a pretty strong red tint. Other than that, the camera work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald T Siddoway

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought one then two more. So easy to use. Can watch my house remotely on my iphone using the app. The plug and play models are easiest to set up and use so I highly recommend them unless you are an IT guru. You will need to set up a DNS service which is free at noip.com or one of the other websites. There are good youtube videos to help you set up your cameras if you are not computer saavy. Don't forget to buy the 32G micro SD card as well
customer_reviews.author: Chris P

customer_reviews.title: Great day and night images
customer_reviews.text: Set up was a breeze with the bar coded system. Great day and night images.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Camera hardware seems to be of good quality, however "plug & play" feature does not ...
customer_reviews.text: Camera hardware seems to be of good quality, however "plug & play" feature does not work as advertised. The iPhone app does initially access the camera, but will lose connection and require re-acquisition continually, and the browser monitoring will not work unless configured manually anyway. Once manually configured (with static IP address and port forwarding), both mobile and browser apps now seem to function well. Not difficult, but not what's being advertised or paid extra for. Foscam tech support was helpful in configuration, and acknowledged the issues with P&P feature.
customer_reviews.author: Flotsam

customer_reviews.title: Great Cam! This is my 2nd Foscam Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great Cam! This is my 2nd Foscam Camera. My first was the FI9821W. I like this one, cause it has an even high resolution, plus the 3X Zoom! Sweet! IN ADDITION, I have had to communicate w/Foscam numerous times, and their Tech Support has been great. They get right back w/me in under a day via email, and provide me with links to answer my specific questions, or how to set up something. This is a Big Plus... cause there are some technicality needs surrounding setting these things up.
customer_reviews.author: Eric W.

customer_reviews.title: its easy to setup to view app on iphone with quick ...
customer_reviews.text: There is no manual or instruction. its easy to setup to view app on iphone with quick set up. but if you want to have motion detect alert. you have to call to installation center . they will just install your PC by distance control. you just sit and relax. Mr. Walter (associate) helped me a lot . He just set up my cam with distance control . hope there is APP push alert for motion detecting but i am happy with email alert . you can send about 3 email alert at the same time .
customer_reviews.author: yonghyeon kim

customer_reviews.title: Great service !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Jessica Clements Great product , very good customer support Foscam FI9826p is a good camera and have a good clarity
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Zoom Is Not Everything
customer_reviews.text: The Zoom is a nice affect but my standard Foscam camera without zoom has a better clearer picture than this one. maximum negative zoom starts out way to small and positive zoom gives it about the same close-up as a standard camera.
customer_reviews.author: Bigrigsz

customer_reviews.title: Lots of trouble to setup, re-setup, re-setup, then it died.
customer_reviews.text: Broken after 1 and half years of usage, the internet lost connection. Before that it's easily locked up about every 2 months. It need reset, reinstall firmware, and redo setup after lock up. Plus the web driver was not supported for new windows 8-10. Need to find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Family Guy

customer_reviews.title: Warning to save your product packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The camera worked absolutely beautifully. Worthy of a 5 star rating. However, mine broke after 3 months, and when asking about warranty repair or replacement (one year per its website), the vendors said that I would need to send it back in its original packaging with all of the boxes contents for Warranty repair or replacement. The lack of product support rates a zero rating.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Ober

customer_reviews.title: which was pretty bad anyway
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from Foscam. Now there is no tech support, which was pretty bad anyway, emails go unanswered, no access to patches or upgrades. Extremely buggy software at the camera, desktop and mobile devices. Not to mention the uggly and bulky design. Next time, I'll stick with recognized brand names.
customer_reviews.author: JOSHUA BERGMAN

customer_reviews.title: Zoom Failed
customer_reviews.text: I own several Foscam cameras, so I was excited to get one with a real optical zoom! But, it failed to operate after only a few uses. I can't zoom back out, it's stuck zoomed in. I can hear it trying, but no movement. Fail.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: ... my security system and these Foscam cameras work the best. They are great and easy to setup and ...
customer_reviews.text: Part of my security system and these Foscam cameras work the best. They are great and easy to setup and easy to arm/disarm at will. Customer service is extremely helpful and courteous and will definitely do whatever they can to assist in getting you up and running.
customer_reviews.author: M and M TBI

customer_reviews.title: DOA returned $15 more for next same model! BS
customer_reviews.text: DOA returned for refund. THEN the camera was $15 MORE when I went to order a new one! Cause the last one was Dead on Arrival!! So I guess they ran out at that price or I got the last one dead lol!
customer_reviews.author: Cirle K Book Sales

customer_reviews.title: Great Guy, Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: The cameras have superb clarity. I contacted FOSCAM to assist in my wireless setup. I had the pleasure of working with Victor Jones the FOSCAM representative. In no time he had the FOSCAM working on my cell phone and tablet for remote viewing. Great Guy, Great Camera. I just bought three more for my self and four for my children as Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: GATOR

customer_reviews.title: Step backwards for Foscam
customer_reviews.text: Seller is shipping v2 which is a huge step backwards from v1. The firmware is buggier and the camera constantly announces status updates very loudly via its external speaker with no way to disable it. I'm a Foscam fan and I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ragan

customer_reviews.title: Won't ever buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst money I've every spent. Does not work properly....only worked for the first couple of months. I should have sent it back. Will never buy again. We are considering expanding our security cameras in our home. Will definitely be looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Great camera... if you can get it set up!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera but VERY difficult to set up. Ultimately, I had to call Foscam technical support and they walked me through everything. I'm a fairly sophisticated technology consumer but I don't think I could do it myself even after having been shown how.
customer_reviews.author: Paracav

customer_reviews.title: plus good resolution and zooming in/out ability
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but I didn't have to get into my Xfinity Router settings at all. So the convenience is worth the price, plus good resolution and zooming in/out ability. Android app provides full function access.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Poor product, no customer support to be found.
customer_reviews.text: No customer service can be contact. You are on your own if you run into connections problem. Cameras keep loosing connections every couple of days, hard to use. Go to Lorextechnology would be a better choice than this China made cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: wouldn't connect wireless to smart phone or ipad
customer_reviews.text: first one was not connecting wireless to phone or ipad. was on phone with tech support for 90 minutes and they couldn't get it to work. Will try a replacement. Software would not recognize camera and connect.
customer_reviews.author: Mz Lynn

customer_reviews.title: This camera works great. I have it connected to a synology NAS ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera works great. I have it connected to a synology NAS and its running strong all day EVERY DAY!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it.Quality images. I'm still having trouble getting it integrated into my system, but I know it's because of me.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this camera because of the advertised high resolution ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera because of the advertised high resolution and ease of setup. Also having dealt with the superb tech support I decided to stay with Foscam. As it turned out, I did need some assistance and once again their highly helpful tech support Allen Smith had me up and running in both Wi-Fi mode and WAN. Very hard to beat these folks for tech support.
customer_reviews.author: cwgodfrey

customer_reviews.title: Great daylight picture, lousy night views however.
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as some of Foscam's other cameras I have purchased in the past. I has a clean and detailed picture during the day, but the night picture is in a word, terrible. If you only want daytime views outdoors, or light views indoors, it will work fine. If you want a good night picture of the outdoors however, this will not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Donn H.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous version that needed replacing. The picture on this is so much clearer, and the zoom is wonderful. Can't speak to the setup...had the IT guy at work do it for me. Works well on the computer from work and cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Rather Be Napping

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning it for a Nest cam as the setup was just ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A Johnson

customer_reviews.title: You did Awesome! Everything works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for helping me out with my Foscam Aldrin Britto. You did Awesome! Everything works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Save your money don't buy a Foscam P2P camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has good video, zoom is good, the software is terrible! Worked some on wifi , but would not work on PC without dropping settings, and NONE on remote on IPHONE! I spent 5+ hours with their experts and they gave up! The price of the camera it should have worked flawlessly! They couldn't even choose the same software each of the 4 times I called for help! The other reviews must have gotten better Experts. Stay away from mike, ann, and michelle, they know only what is written in the scripted "fixes". I returned camera after wasting my whole weekend! thank goodness for Amazon's return policy!
customer_reviews.author: Pro_Engr

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality HD video
customer_reviews.text: Super high quality HD video. Web sight is garbage. Camera only connects if your phone signal is full power.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Image quality and pan / tilt control is good. Phone app works
customer_reviews.text: Camera setup difficult to complete everything without tech support. Image quality and pan / tilt control is good. Phone app works. Had problems with Central Management software. Called tech support. Lisa was very helpful and able to show best way to change settings using web client. Also helped with email alert setup and patrol path setup.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The camera has a great picture and the pan and zoom controls are great
customer_reviews.text: Kevin at support was outstanding he set the camera up in no time at all. The camera has a great picture and the pan and zoom controls are great
customer_reviews.author: Steve

product_meta.title: Foscam FI9826PW Plug and Play 1.3 Megapixel, 1280 x 960 Pixels, 3x Optical Zoom, H.264 Pan/Tilt Wireless IP Camera (White)
feature_bullets: Plug and Play featuring QR code to scan using "Foscam Viewer" app. Compatible with Windows PC and Apple Mac Web Browsers (IE, Firefox and Safari) as well as iOS and Android mobile devices.
3x Optical Zoom, 280 x 960p Display Resolution, H.264 compression for smoother video & smaller files.
Wireless B/G/N compatible, Indoor pan/tilt wireless IP camera, Two-way audio.
300 degree pan, 120 degree tilt, IR lights for night vision up to 8 meters, Free Foscam DDNS Service Embedded for customers with Dynamic IP Addresses.
Day/Night Surveillance, IR LEDs On/Off/Auto Switch, Motion Detection alarm via E-Mail and FTP.
